data.author: acymbalski

changelog.release_notes:
- Seasonal color palettes now generate correctly
- Slight modification to band generation to prevent the minute band from dominating the display
- Now supports Pebble Time Round

- No longer crashes watch after latest OS update
- New generation algorithm - should be more lightweight and reliable

Pattern now changes gradually with time instead of randomly every minute.
Color scheme should change twice a day or whenever the app is reloaded.

To do:
-Color scheme by season
-Add multiple plaid pattern styles

Initial Release

To do:
- Add AM/PM indicator
- Allow flannel patterns to follow themes? Cool colors for winter, warmer for summer?
- Slower color transitions - more of a gradual fade every minute than a completely new pattern
- Publish code once cleaned

data.description:
Displays the time, no tricks.
The background is a plaid pattern that's generated based on the current date and time. The color scheme is generated based on the current season.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Seasonal color palettes now generate correctly
- Slight modification to band generation to prevent the minute band from dominating the display
- Now supports Pebble Time Round

data.title: Flannel Thursday
